scripts.clean:full: rimraf -v -I api/server api/server.exe api/data dist frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.dev:backend: cd api && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true IMAGE_PATH=E:/photography ADMIN_USER=admin ADMIN_PASSWORD=password go run .
scripts.build:backend: cd api && go build -o server . && cpy server . --rename=server.exe
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cpy dist ../
scripts.build: cross-env CGO_ENABLED=0 npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.preview:go: cd api && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true IMAGE_PATH=E:/photography ADMIN_USER=admin ADMIN_PASSWORD=password server.exe
